hero.title: Gucunga Ibikoresho
hero.subtitle: Kurikirana, cunga, kandi uvugurure ibikoresho by'ikigo cyawe mu buryo bworoshye.
hero.subtitle2: Uburyo bugezweho bwo gukurikirana, gucunga no gusangira ibikoresho mu kigo cyawe. Byakozwe n'abanyeshuri, byagenewe abanyeshuri.

features.title: Ibyo ukeneye byose ngo ucunge ibikoresho
features.subtitle: Ibikoresho simusiga byagenewe korohereza buri wese mu kigo gukurikirana ibikoresho.
features.smartInventoryDesc: Gushyira ibintu mu byiciro hifashishijwe AI no gushakisha mu buryo bwenge.
features.qrScanningDesc: Kwinjira/Gusohoka ako kanya ukoresheje code za QR. Nta kwandika n'intoki bikenewe.
features.smartAlertsDesc: Kwibutsa mu buryo bwikora amatariki ntarengwa, gusana, no kumenya niba bihari.
features.analyticsDesc: Kurikirana imikoreshereze, menya ibigezweho, no kunoza ububiko.
features.roleAccessDesc: Uruhushya rwihariye ku banyeshuri, abakozi, n'abayobozi.
features.multiPlatformDesc: Koresha igikoresho icyo aricyo cyose - mudasobwa, tablet, cyangwa telefoni.

howItWorks.title: Biroroshye nka 1-2-3-4
howItWorks.subtitle: Kuva ushakisha kugezaugaruye, igikorwa cyose gitwara iminota mike.

users.title: Ninde ukoresha Tracknity?
users.subtitle: Kuva ku banyeshuri kugera ku bayobozi, buri wese yungukira mu micungire y'ibikoresho inoze.
users.studentsDesc: Shakisha, saba, kandi ukurikirane ibikoresho mu buryo bworoshye
users.mediaTeamsDesc: Huza cameras, micro, n'ibikoresho bya studio

contact.title: Tuvugishe
contact.subtitle: Ufite ibibazo? Twishimiye kumva ibyo utubwira. Ohereza ubutumwa!
